headline: Licenciada en Gestión de Recursos Humanos

experience.description:
Apoyo directo a la responsable del área en tareas administrativas y de gestión de personas.
Colaboración en procesos de reclutamiento, organización de documentación, coordinación
de actividades internas. Participación en la implementación de iniciativas orientadas al
bienestar y desarrollo del equipo. Colaboración con el área de PRL coordinando exámenes
médicos, formaciones, control de documentación obligatoria y comunicación de protocolos
internos para garantizar el cumplimiento normativo. Asistencia y seguimiento de
onboarding de nuevos ingresos coordinando la documentación de ingreso, preparando
materiales de bienvenida y acompañando a los equipos en el proceso de integración
cultural y administrativa.

Participé en el diseño e implementación de programas de beneficios para colaboradores,
así como en el desarrollo de un programa de promoción interna orientado al crecimiento y
retención del talento. Colaboré en el diseño y gestión integral del programa de pasantías,
acompañando todo el proceso desde la selección hasta la integración de los estudiantes.
Brindé asesoramiento y soporte administrativo a las distintas unidades de negocio de la
compañía, garantizando el cumplimiento de procesos internos. Además, trabajé de manera
conjunta con el área de Sistemas en el diseño e implementación de un sistema de registro
de ingreso y egreso de la jornada laboral, optimizando la gestión del control horario.

Gestioné procesos de reclutamiento y selección, así como el control de licencias y
absentismo y la organización administrativa del área. Colaboré en la creación de reportes e
indicadores KPI junto al área de Sistemas, impulsando la toma de decisiones estratégicas.
Además, apoyé al área de Capacitación en la implementación de programas de formación.

experience.position: Analista S. Sr de recursos humanos
experience.description:
Participé en la búsqueda y atracción de talento a través de RRSS y en la ejecución de
programas de capacitación. Colaboré en la digitalización de información y en el comité
evaluador de desempeño y potencial para posiciones jerárquicas. Impulsé el programa de
movilidad interna para puestos clave y realicé el seguimiento de KPI. Gestioné relaciones
laborales, liderando acuerdos de desvinculación en buenos términos y participando en
reuniones gremiales. Asimismo, coordiné la implementación del Programa de Jóvenes
Profesionales, fortaleciendo el desarrollo de talento interno.

Llevé adelante la gestión integral de nóminas y participé activamente en relaciones
laborales, reclutamiento y selección de talento. Estuve a cargo de la administración del
área de RRHH y la conducción de evaluaciones de desempeño. Además, coordiné eventos
corporativos y programas de pasantías, impulsando la cultura organizacional y el
desarrollo profesional. Colaboré con el área de Seguridad e Higiene en capacitaciones
anuales y planes de mejora continua.

Gestioné procesos de selección, coordiné programas de inducción y planes de
capacitación. Colaboré en la implementación de evaluaciones de desempeño
y en la administración de novedades para pre-liquidación de nómina. Aseguré
el cumplimiento de normativas ISO 9001 en procesos de RRHH y brindé
soporte en auditorías externas, contribuyendo a la certificación de calidad de la compañía.

Realizaba la liquidación de nóminas, criba curricular, entrevistas telefónicas,
personales y grupales, asegurando la incorporación de perfiles alineados a las
necesidades del negocio. Coordiné los procesos de contratación laboral. Logré
coordinar de manera eficiente el personal en campañas agrícolas,
garantizando la disponibilidad de recursos humanos necesarios para dar
soporte a la operación. Esta gestión permitió cumplir en tiempo y forma con
los objetivos productivos y responder eficazmente a las demandas de los
clientes del sector agropecuario, fortaleciendo la confianza en la compañía y
asegurando la continuidad del servicio.

Gestión de recursos humanos/Administración de personal
Gestión de recursos humanos/Administración de personal

headline: Chemical Engineer - Quality Management
about:
👋 Hola! soy Paula,

Soy Ingeniera Química y Mg. en Ingeniería de la Calidad con más de diez años de experiencia centrados en el aseguramiento de la calidad. A pesar de mi sólida formación en ésta área, he decidido emprender un nuevo camino profesional y sumergirme en el mundo SAP EWM, con la firme intención de seguir ampliando mis conocimientos.

experience.description:
- Evaluación de los requisitos funcionales con el cliente.
- Configuración del sistema SAP según las necesidades del negocio.
- Redacción del BBP y de las especificaciones funcionales.
- Redacción de manuales de procesos y capacitación de los usuarios finales.
- Ejecución y soporte de pruebas funcionales.
- Soporte en actividades de cutover y Go Live.
- Soporte post-implementación.

Responsible for carrying out internal audits, treatment of non-conformities and opportunities for improvement. Coordinate with each person in charge of the area the definition of corrective actions, ensuring their implementation and monitoring. Implementation of continuous improvement actions, provide technical support on issues related to Quality. Drafting of procedures, protocols and reports. Training and implementation of the 5 "S" methodology

- Desarrollo de nuevos productos
- Investigación de materias primas para la innovación y mejora de productos existentes.
- Contacto con proveedores.
- Gestión de desviaciones y productos fuera de especificación, dando soporte a los distintos sectores de la planta, para lograr la correcta resolución de los mismos, identificando la causa raíz e implementando acciones.
- Confección de especificaciones y métodos, asegurando el mantenimiento actualizado de los mismos.
- Control de calidad de materia prima, material de embalaje, producto en proceso y terminado.
- Inscripción de productos en ANMAT, confección del soporte documental.

experience.companyName: National Institute of Catalysis and Petrochemistry
experience.description: Optimization of the formulation of catalysts based on sepiolite for the construction of diesel soot filters.

education.fieldOfStudy: Especialista en ingeniería de la Calidad

headline: Dentista general en TigreDental
about:
Hola, mi nombre es Thomas Mosqueira. 

Hace 2 años que me recibí de Odontólogo 🦷 en la Universidad Nacional de La Plata (FOLP). Comencé mi trayectoria asistiendo cirugías implantologicas en consultorios privados, luego desempeñándome como odontólogo general en distintas clínicas de la provincia de Buenos Aires. 

Amplié mis estudios en el Instituto de Salud Bucal donde realice el curso de Endomix (Endodoncia Mecanizada) y en la Sociedad Argentina de Implantología Oral donde realice el curso de Implantología Oral. Actualmente me encuentro realizando la especialización de Prostodoncia en la Universidad de Buenos Aires (UBA) mientras continuo mejorando mis aptitudes en el ámbito de la implantología y rehabilitación oral. 

Por otra parte, estoy realizando la Tecnicatura de Administración en la UTN de la ciudad de Buenos Aires para potenciar mi gestión como Director de mi clínica "Tigre Dental" ubicada en la localidad de Tigre. 
Tengo interés en la odontología digital y conocimiento en el manejo de programas como Blue Sky Bio Dental Implant Systems. 

Si te intereso mi perfil, podes contactarme por este medio o a mi correo: thomasmosqueira@hotmail.com.

José C. Paz, Buenos Aires Province, Argentina

headline: 🚀 Shaping the Future of Internal Communications @Globant
about:
👩🏽‍💻 For over nine years, I've been immersed in the dynamic world of communication, where my passion has been to reinvent how we connect. I love thinking outside the box and experimenting with new ideas to generate engagement and make communications appealing and original.

🪄 I've been privileged to lead significant projects to strengthen employer branding, culture, and communication for various organizations. How do I do it? I use artificial intelligence, innovative resources, and even a touch of magic to communicate in ways that genuinely captivate and motivate people.

💬 If you'd like to chat or collaborate on a project, don't hesitate to reach out!
topSkills: Communication • Teamwork • Creativity and Innovation • Engaging People • Content Creation

experience.description: ▸ I lead the internal communication strategy across Europe, covering 15 countries. I focus on implementing innovative solutions, creating high-impact content, and analyzing metrics to measure effectiveness. I use AI tools to optimize time, personalize messages according to each country's context, and strengthen team connections. Additionally, I manage and oversee internal communication in the APAC and MENA regions through a team member. I act as a strategic link with key areas to align communication with business objectives in a global technology company.
▸ As part of the Master's in People Management and Direction, I focused on recruitment, culture, communication, and events in this practice.

experience.position: Senior Analyst in Regional Internal Communication
experience.description:
▸ In charge of reinventing regional communications using AI tools and social media trends.
▸ Organizer of disruptive internal events and activities to foster greater engagement among organization members.
▸ Cross-functional support, primarily for the regions of Argentina, Uruguay, Brazil, and Chile (+10,000 Globers), and likewise for all of Latin America (+20,000 Globers).

volunteering.description:
Within this area I coordinated a group of volunteers where the objective was to contact high schools to join the TECHO project.
I supervised and controlled the monitoring of the schools, attended meetings with directors and the head of the institution and provided the tools and knowledge that my work team had.

In this role I coordinated a group of volunteers in the Manzone neighborhood, located in Villa Astolfi, where the objective was to survey the families of the neighborhood about their income, the conditions in which they lived, learn more about their situation in order to prioritize the families who were going to participate in the construction of houses.

element.headline: 🚀 Shaping the Future of Internal Communications @Globant
element.about:
👩🏽‍💻 For over nine years, I've been immersed in the dynamic world of communication, where my passion has been to reinvent how we connect. I love thinking outside the box and experimenting with new ideas to generate engagement and make communications appealing and original.

🪄 I've been privileged to lead significant projects to strengthen employer branding, culture, and communication for various organizations. How do I do it? I use artificial intelligence, innovative resources, and even a touch of magic to communicate in ways that genuinely captivate and motivate people.

💬 If you'd like to chat or collaborate on a project, don't hesitate to reach out!
element.topSkills: Communication • Teamwork • Creativity and Innovation • Engaging People • Content Creation

experience.description: ▸ I lead the internal communication strategy across Europe, covering 15 countries. I act as a strategic link with key areas to align communication with business objectives in a global technology company.

experience.location: Valencia/València, Comunidad Valenciana / Comunitat Valenciana, España
experience.description:
- NLP solutions for health chat consultations
- Integration of Generative AI and LLM-powered features to Abi services
- MLOps with Azure, AWS & GCP

experience.position: AI Researcher & Computer Vision Engineer - Program for Artificial Intelligence in Health
experience.description:
Programa de Inteligencia Artificial en Salud. 

Departamento de Informática en Salud.

Proyectos para incorporar IA en los flujos de trabajo clínicos. Trabajo en equipo con distintos servicios del hospital.
-Desarrollo de modelos Deep Learning para Soporte a la Decisión en diágnostico, a partir de imágenes médicas.
-Preparación de datasets de imágenes médicas
- Desarrollo de modelos predictivos de Machine Learning. Extracción radiomica
- Python. Tensorflow, Keras, Pytorch. Deploy de APIs en Django 
- Configuración y uso de GPU. Procesamiento local y remoto. AWS: EC2, S3, Sagemaker. 
- Validación e integración en flujo clínico (PACS, Historia Clínica Electrónica y otros SIS)

experience.position: Unidad de Cirugía Asistida por Computadora
experience.description:
Grupo multidisciplinario para el desarrollo y el uso asistencial de tecnologías para cirugía basadas en imágenes médicas: Planeamiento virtual preoperatorio, Navegación virtual intraoperatoria, Impresión 3D
Principales tareas desarrolladas: 
-Desarrollo de plugins en C++ para aplicaciones de uso clínico. Interfaz gráfica Qt.
-Librerías de VTK, ITK y MITK
-Tesis de grado:  Uso de un navegador quirúrgico para cuantificar en forma intraoperatoria el error en la ejecución de una osteotomía.

Empresa nacional fabricante de productos electrónicos de diagnóstico para cardiología. 
Principales tareas desarrolladas: 
-Desarrollo de software para aplicación de Windows, para el análisis de estudios cardiológicos ambulatorios (Holter), en Visual Basic. 
-Diseño de sistema de detección digital de latidos estimulados con marcapasos en señales ECG.

Empresa fabricante de implantes quirúrgicos para Traumatología y Ortopedia. 

Principales tareas desarrolladas: 
- Preparación para certificaciones: BPF ANMAT 3266/13, Directiva 93/42/EEC, ISO 13.485
- Seguimiento del SGC. Revisión de Procedimientos y documentación. Tecnovigilancia y
Tablero de indicadores.
- Redacción y revisión de Registros Maestros de Producto (Informe Técnico, Evaluación
clínica, Gestión de riesgo, R.E.S.E.) según norma.
- Asuntos regulatorios: registro y seguimiento de PM Clase II y III para ANMAT y para otros entes regulatorios latinoamericanos.
- Control de Calidad de implantes médicos. Emisión y seguimiento de Registros de Producción.
- Validaciones de procesos según norma armonizada.
- Tratamiento de No Conformidades y reclamos de cliente. Acciones preventivas y
correctivas.

education.description:
Ayudante de cátedra en los cursos:
-Señales y Sistemas
-Sistemas de Control
-Procesamiento de Señales Biomédicas

education.degree: Doctorado en Procesamiento de Señales e Imágenes

headline: Architect
about:
Arquitecta Urbanista de la FAUD Córdoba, Argentina.
Creativa, detallista, disciplinada y resolutiva. Facilidad a la hora de trabajar en equipo y gestionar equipos humanos. Capacidad de sintesis y analisis. Adaptacion al medio, dinamismo y predisposición al cambio.

Me apasiona la Arquitectura, el Interiorismo y el Paisajismo, considero que cada proyecto es un desafío nuevo con la oportunidad de seguir aprendiendo, creciendo e innovando.

Experiencia en pequeñas reformas, asesoramiento en interiorismo, visualización de proyectos. Proyectos en distintas escalas de urbanización y paisajística.
Experiencia en el área Pública, el lo cual me dota de experiencia tanto en el ámbito Público como Privado.

Mis habilidades profesionales son manejo de planos, edición de conformes a obra, presentación de proyectos, trato con clientes, formulación de presupuestos. Utilizo herramientas como AutoCad, Scketch Up, Lumion, Photo Shop, Ilustrator, Office y un poco de Adobe Premier. Estuve incursionando en IA para perfeccionar imágenes de proyectos, fotomontajes e imágenes para venta.
topSkills: Diseño arquitectónico • Diseño de interiores • Gestión de proyectos • Comercialización visual • Arquitectura del paisaje

skills: Proceso de planificación, elaboración de presupuestos y pronósticos

experience.companyName: Ministerio de Educación de la Nación

projects.title: FUNNY HOUSE
projects.description: Desde un primer momento, creímos necesario conservar la lógica de diseño con la que la casa original fue construida, ya que desarrolla un habitar característico y único. La vivienda proponía un modo de vida interesante, tipo loft, pero difícil de conciliar para más de una persona, dado que los espacios estaban conectados y sin posibilidad de separarlos. Desde el principio, el proyecto buscó integrar la vivienda al patio a través de una galería que sirve como intermedio para la integración de la vida cotidiana con las actividades y vistas del exterior, logrando así accesibilidad directa y un mayor uso de los espacios. El nuevo dormitorio se reubica en la parte delantera de la vivienda, generando una nueva expansión hacia el patio delantero, logrando una integración del dormitorio y el frondoso jardín. Buscamos mantener el concepto de vida Loft, integrándolo visualmente al comedor y la cocina. La materialidad del proyecto busca colores cálidos, sectores con curvas y arcos, y pretende unificar lo viejo con lo nuevo, formando una totalidad.

projects.title: ALTOS DEL LIBERTADOR
projects.description:
Barrio privado localizado en la ciudad de San Juan. En este caso el loteo se encontraba en curso, se nos encarga el desarrollo del cerramiento del mismo, la garita seguridad, el desarrollo de los espacios verdes y el SUM del barrio.
El cliente nos sugiere la posibilidad de utilizar tanques de acero que tenía de una antigua bodega. Desde el primer momento lo tomamos como premisa, y desarrollamos la propuesta con este elemento como protagonista.

projects.title: CASA CARACOL
projects.description:
La Casa Caracol se inscribe dentro de las proporciones áureas, su foco, en el patio central interior, organiza los espacios y el recorrido de la vivienda.
Este patio central interior, busca reconectar con lo primitivo, la naturaleza, volver a tejer lazos con lo olvidado en la civilización, con nuestro lado mas básico. Busca evocar en nuestro inconsciente eso primordial, para devolvernos una mirada mas limpia, mas clara, mas esencial.
Bajo este concepto, la casa se desarrolla en función de ésta centralidad en doble altura, con la cual todos los espacios dialogan.

projects.title: BARRIO ASIJEMIN
projects.description:
En esta oportunidad desarrollamos un barrio privado para el gremio de la minería en San Juan. La propuesta incorporó una piedra basal, como símbolo de la actividad minera, la cual es el hito de ingreso al barrio.
Se plantea a su vez un conjunto comercial para servicio del mismo y del sector. Cafés coworking, almacenes, bares, oficinas y gimnasios.

projects.title: INTERIORISMO
projects.description: Proyecto de Interiorismo para la Casa de Fede

projects.title: STAND COMERCIAL
projects.description: Prototipos de stand comercial con perfil empresarial para la famosa feria de "Clarín" en Buenos Aires, Argentina. Se trata de un gran recinto que alberga distintos stands donde concurren diferentes empresas a las que se les otorga un espacio para exposición, conferencias, recepción de posibles clientes, periodistas, etc. La distribución del predio daba tres posibilidades en tipologías, esquina, isla y entre stands por lo que se desarrollaron dos alternativas para cada situación con improntas diferentes.

headline: Lead Product Designer at @Contractbook | UI/UX Designer & Strategist | Design mentor at @ADPlist  | Learning Coach
about:
As a Lead Product Designer, I bring a strategic mindset and extensive experience in both B2B and B2C environments, incuding startups. I am passionate about finding innovative solutions that drive business success by aligning design decisions with user-centric principles and overarching objectives. 
I am deeply dedicated to crafting exceptional user experiences that leave a lasting impact.

With a proven track record of managing complex projects, I effectively collaborate with cross-functional teams to deliver notable user experiences. My focus on balancing user needs, technical constraints, and business requirements ensures the creation of visually appealing and functionally robust products.
 
Surrounding myself with people who would help me to gain professional and personal growth is something I highly value.  I am passionate about facing new challenges and being driven out of my comfort zone.

Let's connect on LinkedIn and explore how we can collaborate to bring our ideas to life.


Design Mentor @ADPList, @Meander

experience.location: Copenhagen, Capital Region of Denmark, Denmark
experience.description:
-Defined and drove the product design vision in partnership with product and engineering
-Led design for high-impact initiatives, from discovery to delivery
-Mentored designers and supported team growth through feedback and collaboration
-Aligned design strategy with business goals using data, research, and user insights

Advocated for user needs in product and roadmap discussions

experience.location: Copenhagen, Capital Region of Denmark, Denmark
experience.description:
-Improved and led the design system to support consistent user experiences across all product areas
-Set up team-wide knowledge sharing to support collaboration and skill growth within designers.
-Defined and tracked UX metrics to guide design decisions and improve the overall product experience.

-Responsible for Information Architecture rework for brand new platform vision.
-Collaborating on setting up processes, principles, frameworks and rituals for the design team from scratch.
-Redesigned core features: Navigation & Home page for Saas platform.
-Driving multiple team design goals leading discovery and problem statements. Providing UX/UI complex patterns not only on feature level, but also platform-wise.
-Collaborating and actively constructing a brand new in-house Design library. Raising the library quality bar by providing documentation and feedback to design patterns & components.

Designing an internal tool that facilitates Google engaging users in research to improve their existing products and chart the course for future products. Working as an embedded Product Designer in the Google tech team.

Working closely with Google client and our in-house Media Monks teams.

Collaborating and designing a variety of different digital products, my tasks include the following:
-Working strategically with other team members across the organization to drive the success of the product
-Evaluating the User Research & Data to shape the product functions
-User Interviews and evaluation of findings
-Running workshops to refine UX strategy and requirements for the products across customer touchpoints.
-Forming a close working relationship with the client through workshops & regular presentations
-Showcasing improved IA and Content Strategy
-Producing Wireframes, Prototypes and user flows
-Development of Personas and Customer Journeys to communicate user needs to the business stakeholders
-Development of UX journeys, user flows & site maps
-Develop A/B testing strategy for relevant customer segments
-Actively build and contribute to Design systems' growth and their documentation.

Working closely with startup founders in Real Estate industry and their teams to solve problems, prototype, design solutions, and helping them validate the idea with real users.

- Working in agile environments, with multiple teams across the organization to achieve optimal efficiency
- Working with developers to build a lean MVP product
- Creation and maintenance of comprehensive design system
- UX research to understand customer needs wants & demands to drive platform feature prioritization

experience.location: Buenos Aires, Buenos Aires Province, Argentina
experience.description:
​​Working closely with startup founders and their teams to solve problems, prototype, design solutions, and helping them validate the idea with real users.
- Helping startups answer their big questions by following UX processes and methodologies.
- Helping startups save money and time by validating their ideas before they build and launch in the market.
- Designing captivating User Interfaces with a great user experience targetting their main audience.

education.description: Diseño centrado en el usuario, Metodologías de trabajo, Lean Ux, Scrum, Research, Metodologías de diseño, Design thinking, Design sprint, Userflow, Arquitectura de la información, Storytelling & MVP, Entrevistas cualitativas, Wireframes y benchmarking, Aplicaciones y web responsive, Patrones de diseño y de interacción, Métricas UX, Estándares y accesibilidad, Prototipo funcional, Pruebas de usabilidad, Wireframes de baja, media y alta fidelidad, Grillas, Atomic design, UI Kits, Moodboard, UI Guidelines, Motion UI.

Evil by Design 3: Influencing Behavior Patterns
Evil by Design 4: Harnessing Illogical Reactions
Evil by Design: Persuasion in UX
Design Thinking for Innovation- University of Virginia
Design Thinking: UX and Advanced Topics

receivedRecommendations.givenByHeadline: Principal Product Manager @ Celonis | IESE Executive MBA
receivedRecommendations.givenAt: September 7, 2023, Ana worked with Camila on the same team
receivedRecommendations.description:
I have had the privilege of working closely with Cami, a talented Senior UX & UI Designer, who played a pivotal role in the complete redesign and Information Architecture of our SaaS product. Cami’s professionalism and autonomy in handling tasks, whether big or small, are truly impressive. She ensures all relevant stakeholders are involved, placing a strong emphasis on customer-centricity.

Cami consistently meets deadlines and delivers high-quality results, making collaboration with her a pleasure. Her concept sessions with our Product Management and Engineering teams have been invaluable in aligning our product vision and bridging the gap between product, design and engineering. Her exceptional communication skills to effectively articulate her design concepts while ensuring they align with technical requirements have made her a great team player.

receivedRecommendations.givenByHeadline: Chief Product Officer @Jobadder | Product & AI | ex-BCG
receivedRecommendations.givenAt: August 30, 2023, Joel was senior to Camila but didn't manage Camila directly
receivedRecommendations.description: I hired Cami in Workpath’s design team, and didn’t regret it a single day. Cami is an extremely skilled & well rounded designer. She has excellent UX & UI sense, is highly efficient and has very high attention to detail. She also works very well as part of both Design and Product teams. But where she truly shines is in structuring & driving complex, strategic problems. She led the full Workpath platform information redesign, balancing multiple simultaneous requirements (information discoverability, task success, user simplicity & platform scalability) to deliver a remarkable outcome for users.

receivedRecommendations.givenByHeadline: Senior Backend Engineer at Workpath
receivedRecommendations.givenAt: August 1, 2023, Juan worked with Camila on the same team
receivedRecommendations.description:
I have had the privilege of working closely with Camila and have been impressed by her skills and dedication to the field.

Camila's expertise in product design is remarkable. She possesses a keen eye for detail and a deep understanding of user experience, delivering solutions that exceed expectations. 

Beyond her technical knowledge, Camila knows how to motivate and inspire team members, encouraging a collaborative work environment, and effectively communicate the vision for each project. 

On a personal level, is great to work with Camila. She exhibits integrity, reliability, and a positive attitude, making her a valuable asset to any team.

receivedRecommendations.givenByHeadline: Director, Product Design | Google at Monks
receivedRecommendations.givenAt: July 28, 2023, Hannah was senior to Camila but didn't manage Camila directly
receivedRecommendations.description:
I worked with Camila for multiple months on an embedded Google project. She was an excellent designer. Not only was she strategic, always considering the user experience on complex internal tooling, but she support UI and product design efforts to apply existing Google patterns which users easily understood. 

This project required everything from UX workshops, to research, and iterative design. I would highly recommend her for any software team.

receivedRecommendations.givenByHeadline: Product Design @ Celonis
receivedRecommendations.givenAt: July 24, 2023, Maria managed Camila directly
receivedRecommendations.description:
Cami would make a strong addition to any product team that needs to solve big, ambiguous problems quickly. At Workpath, she successfully led the complete redesign of the product's Information Architecture, resulting in a seamless taxonomy and navigation and an outstanding, customer-centric user experience.
Cami can do it all: strategic / systems thinking, complex problem framing and solving, interaction and visual design, she excels at facilitating and aligning design efforts throughout the entire organization. On top of that, she's a great collaborator and a culture add to any team she joins.
I'm continually impressed by Cami’s impeccable work ethic and leadership skills—you'd be lucky to have her on your team!

receivedRecommendations.givenByHeadline: Product Design @ SAP LeanIX | Strategic Design & Design Systems | B2B SaaS | MA, arts and culture management
receivedRecommendations.givenAt: July 24, 2023, Nadeen worked with Camila on the same team
receivedRecommendations.description:
Cami is an exceptional colleague who exemplifies responsibility and takes ownership of her tasks and projects. Her ability to handle larger scale projects with efficiency and effectiveness demonstrates her extensive knowledge and seniority as a designer. She excels at time management and multitasking, consistently delivering high-quality work. 

On a personal level, Cami's cheerful, smart, and communicative nature positively influences the team's work and fosters a healthy work environment. She is skilled at presenting complex ideas in a simple and understandable manner, benefiting internal design team communication and company-wide Townhalls. Additionally, Cami goes the extra mile to educate and support her team, advocating for better processes and product quality overall. Working with Cami has been a pleasure and I would wholeheartedly recommend her to any team!

receivedRecommendations.givenByHeadline: AI UX Design Director: product and UX strategy and design for Monks’ own agentic platform focused on automating workflows for marketers.
receivedRecommendations.givenAt: July 18, 2023, Sjoerd was senior to Camila but didn't manage Camila directly
receivedRecommendations.description: Cami was on the Google team for about a year, but with little time she made a big impression. She is eager to learn and has an immense intrinsic work drive. She worked on a large platform in her time with us, a project with lots of unknowns and many different stakeholders. By showing ownership and working systematically, Cami proved that she has no problem handling complexity and ambiguity. A pleasure to work with!

receivedRecommendations.givenByHeadline: Product @ TeamViewer | TUM | CDTM
receivedRecommendations.givenAt: July 17, 2023, Saad worked with Camila on the same team
receivedRecommendations.description:
It has been an absolute privilege to work with Cami! She is a very capable designer who can also take on complex topics like Information Architecture, UI redesign, and creating design systems. She makes sure to see such initiatives till their completion!
Camila would be a valuable addition to any team she joins because she is such a complete and well rounded product designer. I would love to have the chance to work with her again!

receivedRecommendations.givenByHeadline: Software Developer
receivedRecommendations.givenAt: July 16, 2023, Pablo worked with Camila on the same team
receivedRecommendations.description:
'Creative problem solver' is the phrase that comes to mind when I think about Camila.

I had the pleasure of working with Camila at Workpath, collaborating on several features and projects.

Her skills in interaction and visual design always amazed me. Her design concepts were a source of constant motivation for the team. We couldn't wait to see them come to life! 

Camila also demonstrates outstanding communication skills which ensures great collaboration when tackling complex tasks together.

I highly recommend her for any project requiring high-quality UI/UX solutions.

receivedRecommendations.givenByHeadline: Fullstack Engineer | 4-Figure Stack Overflow Reputation | 6+ Years in Software Development
receivedRecommendations.givenAt: July 14, 2023, Francisco Javier worked with Camila on the same team
receivedRecommendations.description:
I had the pleasure of working with Cami for approximately a year, where she served as a designer while I worked as a frontend engineer at Workpath.

Cami has outstanding communication skills. She actively seeks feedback from the team, shows different UX paths, and carefully analyzes the most suitable option from a user's perspective. She effortlessly explains design decisions, making them accessible to team members from different backgrounds.

Cami's commitment to consistency is remarkable as she played a pivotal role in implementing a new internal design system that enhanced the Workpath application. Additionally, her design of the application's critical paths, such as the Home page and the navigation system showcased her ability to optimize the user experience.

Beyond her exceptional professional qualities, Cami is someone you always want to have on your team. Whether working on a project or simply grabbing a coffee, her friendly nature creates an enjoyable and positive environment.

receivedRecommendations.givenByHeadline: Senior Full Stack Engineer
receivedRecommendations.givenAt: July 14, 2023, Farooq Ahmed worked with Camila on the same team
receivedRecommendations.description: I had the pleasure of working with Camilia and I was consistently impressed by her exceptional talent and dedication. Camilia has a unique ability to blend creativity, functionality, and user-centric design principles to create stunning and intuitive user interfaces. Throughout our collaboration, I witnessed Camilia's meticulous attention to detail and her commitment to delivering outstanding results. She has an incredible eye for aesthetics and possesses a deep understanding of how to create meaningful user experiences. Her designs not only captivate users visually but also enhance usability and engagement. Beyond her technical expertise, she is a pleasure to work with. She is a fantastic communicator and collaborator, making her an invaluable team member. She listens attentively, ask thoughtful questions, and integrate feedback seamlessly. I am really glad to have worked with her and hope I get a chance to work with her in the future as well.

receivedRecommendations.givenByHeadline: Certified PMP and ScrumMaster.
receivedRecommendations.givenAt: July 12, 2023, Allie worked with Camila on the same team
receivedRecommendations.description: I worked with Cami on a complex program revamp over the span of 6+ months. She did an amazing job with the UX and product design! We were working with a lot of changing requirements, quick turnaround times and ambiguous requests, and she handled it all exceptionally well. She is able to understand complexities of a program and transform them into clear and thoughtful designs.

element.headline: Lead Product Designer at @Contractbook | UI/UX Designer & Strategist | Design mentor at @ADPlist  | Learning Coach
element.about:
As a Lead Product Designer, I bring a strategic mindset and extensive experience in both B2B and B2C environments, incuding startups. I am passionate about finding innovative solutions that drive business success by aligning design decisions with user-centric principles and overarching objectives. 
I am deeply dedicated to crafting exceptional user experiences that leave a lasting impact.

With a proven track record of managing complex projects, I effectively collaborate with cross-functional teams to deliver notable user experiences. My focus on balancing user needs, technical constraints, and business requirements ensures the creation of visually appealing and functionally robust products.
 
Surrounding myself with people who would help me to gain professional and personal growth is something I highly value.  I am passionate about facing new challenges and being driven out of my comfort zone.

Let's connect on LinkedIn and explore how we can collaborate to bring our ideas to life.


Design Mentor @ADPList, @Meander

experience.location: Copenhagen, Capital Region of Denmark, Denmark
experience.description:
-Defined and drove the product design vision in partnership with product and engineering
-Led design for high-impact initiatives, from discovery to delivery
-Mentored designers and supported team growth through feedback and collaboration
-Aligned design strategy with business goals using data, research, and user insights

Advocated for user needs in product and roadmap discussions

experience.location: Copenhagen, Capital Region of Denmark, Denmark
experience.description:
-Improved and led the design system to support consistent user experiences across all product areas
-Set up team-wide knowledge sharing to support collaboration and skill growth within designers.
-Defined and tracked UX metrics to guide design decisions and improve the overall product experience.

-Responsible for Information Architecture rework for brand new platform vision.
-Collaborating on setting up processes, principles, frameworks and rituals for the design team from scratch.
-Redesigned core features: Navigation & Home page for Saas platform.
-Driving multiple team design goals leading discovery and problem statements. Providing UX/UI complex patterns not only on feature level, but also platform-wise.
-Collaborating and actively constructing a brand new in-house Design library. Raising the library quality bar by providing documentation and feedback to design patterns & components.

Designing an internal tool that facilitates Google engaging users in research to improve their existing products and chart the course for future products. Working as an embedded Product Designer in the Google tech team.

Working closely with Google client and our in-house Media Monks teams.

Collaborating and designing a variety of different digital products, my tasks include the following:
-Working strategically with other team members across the organization to drive the success of the product
-Evaluating the User Research & Data to shape the product functions
-User Interviews and evaluation of findings
-Running workshops to refine UX strategy and requirements for the products across customer touchpoints.
-Forming a close working relationship with the client through workshops & regular presentations
-Showcasing improved IA and Content Strategy
-Producing Wireframes, Prototypes and user flows
-Development of Personas and Customer Journeys to communicate user needs to the business stakeholders
-Development of UX journeys, user flows & site maps
-Develop A/B testing strategy for relevant customer segments
-Actively build and contribute to Design systems' growth and their documentation.

Working closely with startup founders in Real Estate industry and their teams to solve problems, prototype, design solutions, and helping them validate the idea with real users.

- Working in agile environments, with multiple teams across the organization to achieve optimal efficiency
- Working with developers to build a lean MVP product
- Creation and maintenance of comprehensive design system
- UX research to understand customer needs wants & demands to drive platform feature prioritization

experience.location: Buenos Aires, Buenos Aires Province, Argentina
experience.description:
​​Working closely with startup founders and their teams to solve problems, prototype, design solutions, and helping them validate the idea with real users.
- Helping startups answer their big questions by following UX processes and methodologies.
- Helping startups save money and time by validating their ideas before they build and launch in the market.
- Designing captivating User Interfaces with a great user experience targetting their main audience.

education.description: Diseño centrado en el usuario, Metodologías de trabajo, Lean Ux, Scrum, Research, Metodologías de diseño, Design thinking, Design sprint, Userflow, Arquitectura de la información, Storytelling & MVP, Entrevistas cualitativas, Wireframes y benchmarking, Aplicaciones y web responsive, Patrones de diseño y de interacción, Métricas UX, Estándares y accesibilidad, Prototipo funcional, Pruebas de usabilidad, Wireframes de baja, media y alta fidelidad, Grillas, Atomic design, UI Kits, Moodboard, UI Guidelines, Motion UI.

receivedRecommendations.givenByHeadline: Principal Product Manager @ Celonis | IESE Executive MBA
receivedRecommendations.givenAt: September 7, 2023, Ana worked with Camila on the same team
receivedRecommendations.description:
I have had the privilege of working closely with Cami, a talented Senior UX & UI Designer, who played a pivotal role in the complete redesign and Information Architecture of our SaaS product. Cami’s professionalism and autonomy in handling tasks, whether big or small, are truly impressive. She ensures all relevant stakeholders are involved, placing a strong emphasis on customer-centricity.

Cami consistently meets deadlines and delivers high-quality results, making collaboration with her a pleasure. Her concept sessions with our Product Management and Engineering teams have been invaluable in aligning our product vision and bridging the gap between product, design and engineering. Her exceptional communication skills to effectively articulate her design concepts while ensuring they align with technical requirements have made her a great team player.

receivedRecommendations.givenByHeadline: Chief Product Officer @Jobadder | Product & AI | ex-BCG
receivedRecommendations.givenAt: August 30, 2023, Joel was senior to Camila but didn't manage Camila directly
receivedRecommendations.description: I hired Cami in Workpath’s design team, and didn’t regret it a single day. Cami is an extremely skilled & well rounded designer. She has excellent UX & UI sense, is highly efficient and has very high attention to detail. She also works very well as part of both Design and Product teams. But where she truly shines is in structuring & driving complex, strategic problems. She led the full Workpath platform information redesign, balancing multiple simultaneous requirements (information discoverability, task success, user simplicity & platform scalability) to deliver a remarkable outcome for users.

receivedRecommendations.givenByHeadline: Senior Backend Engineer at Workpath
receivedRecommendations.givenAt: August 1, 2023, Juan worked with Camila on the same team
receivedRecommendations.description:
I have had the privilege of working closely with Camila and have been impressed by her skills and dedication to the field.

Camila's expertise in product design is remarkable. She possesses a keen eye for detail and a deep understanding of user experience, delivering solutions that exceed expectations. 

Beyond her technical knowledge, Camila knows how to motivate and inspire team members, encouraging a collaborative work environment, and effectively communicate the vision for each project. 

On a personal level, is great to work with Camila. She exhibits integrity, reliability, and a positive attitude, making her a valuable asset to any team.

receivedRecommendations.givenByHeadline: Director, Product Design | Google at Monks
receivedRecommendations.givenAt: July 28, 2023, Hannah was senior to Camila but didn't manage Camila directly
receivedRecommendations.description:
I worked with Camila for multiple months on an embedded Google project. She was an excellent designer. Not only was she strategic, always considering the user experience on complex internal tooling, but she support UI and product design efforts to apply existing Google patterns which users easily understood. 

This project required everything from UX workshops, to research, and iterative design. I would highly recommend her for any software team.

receivedRecommendations.givenByHeadline: Product Design @ Celonis
receivedRecommendations.givenAt: July 24, 2023, Maria managed Camila directly
receivedRecommendations.description:
Cami would make a strong addition to any product team that needs to solve big, ambiguous problems quickly. At Workpath, she successfully led the complete redesign of the product's Information Architecture, resulting in a seamless taxonomy and navigation and an outstanding, customer-centric user experience.
Cami can do it all: strategic / systems thinking, complex problem framing and solving, interaction and visual design, she excels at facilitating and aligning design efforts throughout the entire organization. On top of that, she's a great collaborator and a culture add to any team she joins.
I'm continually impressed by Cami’s impeccable work ethic and leadership skills—you'd be lucky to have her on your team!

receivedRecommendations.givenByHeadline: Product Design @ SAP LeanIX | Strategic Design & Design Systems | B2B SaaS | MA, arts and culture management
receivedRecommendations.givenAt: July 24, 2023, Nadeen worked with Camila on the same team
receivedRecommendations.description:
Cami is an exceptional colleague who exemplifies responsibility and takes ownership of her tasks and projects. Her ability to handle larger scale projects with efficiency and effectiveness demonstrates her extensive knowledge and seniority as a designer. She excels at time management and multitasking, consistently delivering high-quality work. 

On a personal level, Cami's cheerful, smart, and communicative nature positively influences the team's work and fosters a healthy work environment. She is skilled at presenting complex ideas in a simple and understandable manner, benefiting internal design team communication and company-wide Townhalls. Additionally, Cami goes the extra mile to educate and support her team, advocating for better processes and product quality overall. Working with Cami has been a pleasure and I would wholeheartedly recommend her to any team!

receivedRecommendations.givenByHeadline: AI UX Design Director: product and UX strategy and design for Monks’ own agentic platform focused on automating workflows for marketers.
receivedRecommendations.givenAt: July 18, 2023, Sjoerd was senior to Camila but didn't manage Camila directly
receivedRecommendations.description: Cami was on the Google team for about a year, but with little time she made a big impression. She is eager to learn and has an immense intrinsic work drive. She worked on a large platform in her time with us, a project with lots of unknowns and many different stakeholders. By showing ownership and working systematically, Cami proved that she has no problem handling complexity and ambiguity. A pleasure to work with!

receivedRecommendations.givenByHeadline: Product @ TeamViewer | TUM | CDTM
receivedRecommendations.givenAt: July 17, 2023, Saad worked with Camila on the same team
receivedRecommendations.description:
It has been an absolute privilege to work with Cami! She is a very capable designer who can also take on complex topics like Information Architecture, UI redesign, and creating design systems. She makes sure to see such initiatives till their completion!
Camila would be a valuable addition to any team she joins because she is such a complete and well rounded product designer. I would love to have the chance to work with her again!

receivedRecommendations.givenByHeadline: Software Developer
receivedRecommendations.givenAt: July 16, 2023, Pablo worked with Camila on the same team
receivedRecommendations.description:
'Creative problem solver' is the phrase that comes to mind when I think about Camila.

I had the pleasure of working with Camila at Workpath, collaborating on several features and projects.

Her skills in interaction and visual design always amazed me. Her design concepts were a source of constant motivation for the team. We couldn't wait to see them come to life! 

Camila also demonstrates outstanding communication skills which ensures great collaboration when tackling complex tasks together.

I highly recommend her for any project requiring high-quality UI/UX solutions.

receivedRecommendations.givenByHeadline: Fullstack Engineer | 4-Figure Stack Overflow Reputation | 6+ Years in Software Development
receivedRecommendations.givenAt: July 14, 2023, Francisco Javier worked with Camila on the same team
receivedRecommendations.description:
I had the pleasure of working with Cami for approximately a year, where she served as a designer while I worked as a frontend engineer at Workpath.

Cami has outstanding communication skills. She actively seeks feedback from the team, shows different UX paths, and carefully analyzes the most suitable option from a user's perspective. She effortlessly explains design decisions, making them accessible to team members from different backgrounds.

Cami's commitment to consistency is remarkable as she played a pivotal role in implementing a new internal design system that enhanced the Workpath application. Additionally, her design of the application's critical paths, such as the Home page and the navigation system showcased her ability to optimize the user experience.

Beyond her exceptional professional qualities, Cami is someone you always want to have on your team. Whether working on a project or simply grabbing a coffee, her friendly nature creates an enjoyable and positive environment.

receivedRecommendations.givenByHeadline: Senior Full Stack Engineer
receivedRecommendations.givenAt: July 14, 2023, Farooq Ahmed worked with Camila on the same team
receivedRecommendations.description: I had the pleasure of working with Camilia and I was consistently impressed by her exceptional talent and dedication. Camilia has a unique ability to blend creativity, functionality, and user-centric design principles to create stunning and intuitive user interfaces. Throughout our collaboration, I witnessed Camilia's meticulous attention to detail and her commitment to delivering outstanding results. She has an incredible eye for aesthetics and possesses a deep understanding of how to create meaningful user experiences. Her designs not only captivate users visually but also enhance usability and engagement. Beyond her technical expertise, she is a pleasure to work with. She is a fantastic communicator and collaborator, making her an invaluable team member. She listens attentively, ask thoughtful questions, and integrate feedback seamlessly. I am really glad to have worked with her and hope I get a chance to work with her in the future as well.

receivedRecommendations.givenByHeadline: Certified PMP and ScrumMaster.
receivedRecommendations.givenAt: July 12, 2023, Allie worked with Camila on the same team
receivedRecommendations.description: I worked with Cami on a complex program revamp over the span of 6+ months. She did an amazing job with the UX and product design! We were working with a lot of changing requirements, quick turnaround times and ambiguous requests, and she handled it all exceptionally well. She is able to understand complexities of a program and transform them into clear and thoughtful designs.

headline: Attorney and Legal Secretary.
about:
🎓 Abogada (Universidad de Buenos Aires, 2021) | Especializada en Derecho Internacional.

Soy abogada graduada en la Universidad de Buenos Aires, con experiencia profesional en organismos del Estado argentino desde 2015. Comencé mi trayectoria en el Ministerio del Interior, brindando asesoramiento legal en procedimientos administrativos. Posteriormente, trabajé en la Cancillería Argentina, en el área de Apostillas y Documentos Internacionales, donde profundicé mis conocimientos en normativa internacional y procesos migratorios.

Resido en España desde 2022, en búsqueda de nuevos desafíos personales y profesionales. Mi formación y experiencia en Derecho Argentino y Español me permiten brindar asesoramiento jurídico integral con perspectiva internacional y enfoque humano.
topSkills: Comunicación • Inglés • Microsoft Office • Servicio de atención al cliente • Administrative Management

experience.description:
Gestionar las operaciones diarias de la tienda. 
Supervisar al personal.

 Gestión del inventario y control de stock. 
Atención al cliente y resolución de conflictos. 
Aplicación de estrategias de marketing. 
Preparación de informes y gestión de presupuestos.

- Confección y redacción de documentos jurídicos y comerciales (en diversos idiomas)
- Gestión Documental de expedientes electrónicos
- Atención al ciudadano

- Asesoría jurídica Derecho de Familia y Violencia de Género en el patrocinio jurídico de la Universidad
- Inicio y contestaciones de demandas
- Redacción de documentos jurídicos
- Mediación virtual entre partes

- Planificación de políticas púbicas en gobiernos locales
- Planificación de agendas a territorio
- Control de documentación para la implementación de distintas políticas públicas
- Elaboración y firma de contratos para la gestión de políticas públicas
- Seguimiento de expedientes 
- Rendiciones de cuentas y elaboración de presupuestos
- Asistencia al ciudadano

headline: Director Comercial -
about:
After graduating from CAECE University in 2001, I began my career in commercial and trade marketing with leading multinational companies including Coca-Cola, Danone Waters, and Owens Illinois (B2B).

Since then, I’ve had the privilege of working across various countries, continuously growing both professionally and personally through each experience.

I have been living in Spain since 2019, where ongoing learning and cultural adaptation have become key sources of inspiration.
My journey—marked by achievements, emigration, and the complete rebuilding of my life—has led me to the invaluable opportunity of leading a major company.

Throughout my career, my core focus has remained the same: to actively listen to both internal and external customers, understand their business needs, and respond with agility. I believe our success depends on doing this consistently, every single day.

On a personal note, I’m proud to be the father of two incredible boys. In my free time, I enjoy spending quality time with family and friends, exploring the world through travel, and following my passion for sports.
topSkills: Trabajo en equipo • Industria farmacéutica • Estrategia empresarial • Dirección y desarrollo de equipos de trabajo

experience.description:
I am an experienced commercial leader with a strong background in international trade, brand development, and retail strategy. Currently leading the Sales Department at Vielong 
I specialize in expanding brands across European markets and managing both on-trade and off-trade channels.

With a career spanning over two decades across Latin America and Europe, I've developed a strategic mindset rooted in results, collaboration, and long-term growth. My expertise includes entering new markets, developing commercial policies, managing key retail channels (supermarkets, cash & carry, distributors), and leading private label projects tailored to diverse market needs.

What drives me is building meaningful, trust-based relationships—with clients, teams, and partners—and creating strategies that not only grow brands but also deliver sustainable value.

Let’s connect if you’re interested in market expansion, brand collaboration, or simply sharing ideas on international retail and commercial strategy.

receivedRecommendations.givenByHeadline: Pharmacist
receivedRecommendations.givenAt: October 25, 2019, Gaston was senior to Greta but didn't manage Greta directly
receivedRecommendations.description: Gastón es un persona de gran calidad profesional y humana. Transmite pasión y dedicación es su trabajo. Escucha y aporta su visión y experiencia para el beneficio de la empresa.

receivedRecommendations.givenByHeadline: Coo & Strategy Division Head
receivedRecommendations.givenAt: April 29, 2010, Adrián managed Gaston directly
receivedRecommendations.description:
He sido jefe de Gastòn en 2 oportunidades en nuestra gestiòn en Danone.
Como Jefe de Trade en el canal supermercados Gastòn ha sido clave en el ordenamiento y profesionalizaciòn de la gestiòn de trade en el canal, aportando ideas innovadoras en el punto de ventas con una correcta implementaciòn y seguimiento de resultados.
Como KAM en el canal supermercados me ha tocado ser su Gerente y ha hecho una gran gestiòn administrando sus clientes desde los resultados y el seguimiento del P&L. Siempre cumpliendo sus acuerdos y con gran capacidad de negociaciòn empàtica con los clientes. Su principal logro en esta gestiòn, es haber logrado que Aguas Danone ganase el galardòn de proveedor del año en Wal Mart por su gestiòn como KAm y coordinando un grupo multifuncional de trabajo.
Es un placer trabajar con alguien que combina visiòn estratègica con capacidad de operaciòn.
Adriàn

receivedRecommendations.givenByHeadline: General Manager Mexico & Latin America Key Accounts @ CHEP
receivedRecommendations.givenAt: April 29, 2010, Giovanni was senior to Gaston but didn't manage Gaston directly
receivedRecommendations.description: Gaston es un gran lider, tiene gran vision de negocio, cuenta con una elevada capacidad de analisis, es una persona muy proactiva y fomenta de forma continua el trabajo en equipo.

receivedRecommendations.description: Gastón es una excelente persona, muy dinámica y aplicada, con una creatividad y practicidad poco comunes, que hace que cumpla continuamente con los objetivos de corto, mediano y largo plazo que debe lograr.

Es un placer trabajar con alguien que combina visiòn estratègica con capacidad de operaciòn.
Adriàn

headline: 2D Animator / IP creator
about:
Animador 2D / Motion Grapher / Ilustrador

Mi pasión es crear mundos ficticios y contar ideas o historias mediante productos audiovisuales diversos que tengan gracia y estilo. 

🖥️ Conocimientos

Moho pro · Adobe Animate · Spine 2D · Adobe Photoshop · Adobe Illustrator · Adobe Premiere · Adobe After Effects · Adobe Audition · Diseño de estructuras 3D en Sketchup · Creación de música digital en Ableton Live y FL Studio · Paquete Office · Google Workspace · Redes sociales 

📌 Habilidades

Ilustracion digital - Animacion 2D cut-out - Animacion 2D tradicional - Edicion de video.

📒 Proyectos

https://www.behance.net/adrianmurcialopez

experience.description: Animación 2D, Motion Graphics e ilustración digital para videos explicativos, institucionales y promocionales de clientes en RRSS.

Montaje, efectos y edición de sonido para cortometrajes de ficción y documental.
Experiencia en cortos de ficción siendo guionista, director de fotografía, director, asistente de dirección y sonidista. 
Conocimiento y experiencia en todos los procesos de un rodaje desde cero: preproducción, producción y postproducción.
Manejo de cámaras DSLR para fotografía y filmación, griperia, iluminación profesional y microfonía para cine.
Animacion 2D de cuentos. Ilustracion, montajes, animacion 2D.

Encargado de la recepción y gestión de pedidos de clientes a la empresa. 
Contacto y cobro directo para coordinar entregas con los clientes.
Administración y órdenes de compra junto con su correspondiente actualización de datos en el sistema TANGO.

Atención al público.
Recepción de pacientes en los sectores de estudios, consultas médicas y guardia.
Facturación y manejo de Posnet.
Administración de órdenes clínicas y autorizaciones para estudios, prácticas y consultas.
Sistemas Markey y Biocom.

Preparación de insumos médicos y farmacológicos para el sector de internación.
Administración y facturación.
Control de stock.

education.description: Diseñar personajes atractivos de forma profesional desde el concepto y los bocetos iniciales hasta la iluminación, composición, modelado y renderizado 3D.

Comprende el diseño del ser. El coach se conoce a si mismo desde un ambito de conciencia, entendiendo el ser como la conjuncion unica y personal de factores internos que se expresan mediante el cuerpo, la emocion y el lenguaje. Luego, aprende a gestionar su persona, para llegar a los objetivos y metas propuestas, logrando asi un equilibrio y coherencia armonica entre los tres ambitos mencionados.

El coach, luego de trabajar en si mismo se expande a acompañar a otras personas que acuden a el con distintos objetivos, para alcanzar su realidad ideal.
Crear, diseñar e implementar imágenes y mensajes audiovisuales en soporte digital.

headline: Liderazgo y alto rendimiento
about:
¡Hola! Mi nombre es Santiago y soy Coach profesional, especializado en liderazgo y alto rendimiento. 

Como Coach estoy formado en diferentes aristas del coaching que tienen al mismo como núcleo principal (Coaching no directivo, life coaching, coaching ontológico, ejecutivo y vocacional). También cuento con formación en Programación Neurolingüística, inteligencia emocional, liderazgo personal y de equipos.

En mis años como Coach tuve la oportunidad de acompañar a cientos de personas en distintos escenarios: acompañamientos individuales, programas de liderazgo personal, talleres de gestión de emociones y formaciones en coaching. Trabajando con ejecutivos, artistas, deportistas, profesionales independientes y emprendedores.

Ocho años de trayectoria corporativa en empresas como Citibank N.A. y Banco Supervielle S.A., me dieron la oportunidad de aprender de grandes líderes, profesionales y de generar relaciones que enriquecieron mi vida profesional y me nutrieron personalmente. 

Desde mi experiencia profesional puedo afirmar que tenés absolutamente todo lo necesario para crear tu realidad ideal y yo cuento con la experiencia y las herramientas para acompañarte a que conectes con tu máximo potencial.

about: Hola! Soy Noelia, con experiencia en trabajo de aeropuertos y enseña en colegios. Actualmente busco empleo. Hablo alemán e inglés y tengo habilidades en atención al cliente, calidad de servicio y resolución de problemas. headline: Chief of Staff | Building Scalable Teams & Cultures | Strategy, Data & HR Tech
about:
🔍 Curious by nature, strategic by design.

I lead People Strategy at the intersection of culture, data, and systems, scaling organizations across LATAM and Europe in EdTech, PropTech, and SaaS. My focus is building inclusive, high-performing teams by aligning talent initiatives with business goals.

What I bring:
🌍 Global & Remote Collaboration – Leading People initiatives in async & hybrid, cross-cultural teams.
🤖 HR Tech & Systems – Slack bots, ATS, onboarding automation & HRIS optimization.
📊 People Analytics – Built Power BI dashboards to track engagement, attrition & TA metrics.
🎯 Culture & Talent Architecture – Designed competency frameworks, rubrics & feedback loops.
🛠 Currently building a Role–Process Interrelation Framework to support scalable org design.

I believe people are complex systems of creativity, experience, and emotion. My goal is to design environments where they thrive and where business thrives with them.
topSkills: People Ops Strategy • HR Tech & Automation • Inclusive Hiring & Culture Building • Change Agility & Continuous Improvement

experience.location: Valencia/València, Comunidad Valenciana / Comunitat Valenciana, España
experience.description:
🎯People Strategy & Employee Experience
Designed and implemented a culture and engagement roadmap aligned with business objectives, supporting employee retention during a period of rapid growth. Acted as HRBP to senior leadership, translating employee insights from check-ins into data-driven action plans that improved motivation and reduced voluntary turnover.

⚙️ Process Automation & Efficiency Gains
Led the end-to-end automation of payroll in partnership with an external vendor, reducing processing time by 40% and ensuring error-free compliance at scale. Selected and integrated tools aligned with financial and legal risk reduction targets.

Policy & Compliance Architecture
Created and implemented HR policies (benefits, leaves, code of conduct) to support compliance and operational scalability. Aligned policies with company values while ensuring readiness for regulatory audits and growth.

🌱 Performance & Talent Development
Rolled out a multi-layered performance feedback system based on EOS’s “Right People, Right Seat,” helping leaders identify critical talent and align development with succession planning.

🔍 Role Design & Org Clarity
Developed product-minded role frameworks and competency maps to align hiring with long-term org design and team scalability. Ensured each new role supported strategic pillars such as customer growth or tech delivery velocity.

🤝 Inclusive Hiring & Decision Frameworks
Introduced a structured, bias-resistant Hiring Rubric that improved quality-of-hire, enabled better decision-making across hiring teams, and improved diversity and hiring decision objectivity by 30%.

🚀 Onboarding & Retention
Revamped the onboarding process across departments to increase time-to-productivity and enhance new hire retention. Used structured feedback from early-stage employees to improve experience touchpoints, reducing 90-day attrition and improving new hire integration scores by 22% (measured via onboarding survey).

Quickin is part of the Inversiva brand portfolio.

While leading People & Culture, I stepped in to restructure Customer Operations during a critical scaling phase. My goal was to bring strategic clarity, process efficiency, and better stakeholder experience across investor, tenant, and maintenance teams, applying People Ops principles to customer workflows.

Phase 1: Operational Clarity & Customer Education
- Mapped workflows across Customer, Renovations, Legal and Tech teams to identify inefficiencies and process gaps.
- Developed and embedded Terms & Conditions into contracts, improving customer clarity and reducing support tickets.
- Standardized workload distribution and internal coordination through process documentation and role clarity.
- Integrated ticketing with the CRM, automating bulk communications and reducing manual work by ~30%.

Phase 2: Scalability & SLA Enforcement
- Introduced SLAs into investor contracts to reduce resolution delays and increase service accountability.
- Led the migration to a new ticketing platform, extending coverage to bookings, finance, and admin, enabling real-time tracking of expenses and SLA compliance.
- Scaled the scope of the Customer Ops team to include tenant, investor, and community management, aligning with business expansion goals.
- Centralized Support & Maintenance into one flow, improving coordination on incidents, renovations, and time-based cost allocation.

experience.location: Valencia/València, Comunidad Valenciana / Comunitat Valenciana, España
experience.description:
Drove alignment between talent strategy and business goals through initiatives in onboarding, feedback systems, and leadership development until the company ceased operations.

- Shaped company culture through engagement rituals, 360º feedback, and strategic onboarding.
- Partnered with Marketing on employer branding and internal comms to boost team alignment.
- Led full-cycle recruitment and workforce planning, supporting scalable growth.
- Optimized HR processes and tools (payroll, perks, workflows), enhancing employee experience and efficiency.
- Acted as HRBP across teams, enabling well-being, retention, and leadership coaching.
skills: Gestión de proyectos de recursos humanos

experience.description:
🤖 HR Tech & Employee Enablement
Designed and deployed a no-code AI chatbot in Slack to automate responses to HR policy and process queries, reducing HR ticket volume by 40% and improving employee satisfaction by ~15%. Enabled real-time self-service for over 200 employees, freeing up HR team capacity to focus on strategic initiatives.

📊 People Analytics & Strategic Insights
Built and maintained Power BI dashboards to monitor turnover trends, offboarding insights, and engagement indicators. These tools reduced time spent on manual analysis by 20% and became core to quarterly strategic planning and executive reporting.

⚙️ Process Optimization & Scalable Infrastructure
Reengineered HR operations to improve service delivery, automate onboarding/offboarding, and standardize workflows across the employee lifecycle. Streamlined coordination between HR, Finance, and IT, ensuring business continuity and readiness for growth.

🛠 ATS Implementation & Scalable Hiring Operations
Led the implementation of a new ATS, enabling structured, scalable hiring across tech & product roles and non-technical ones. Oversaw integration with internal tools and vendor management, improving recruiter efficiency and increasing hiring velocity while ensuring alignment with DEI goals.
skills: Gestión de proyectos de recursos humanos
Dirección y desarrollo de equipos de trabajo

experience.position: Talent Acquisition Lead | Business Support - Tech Lead
experience.description:
🌎 Regional Talent Acquisition Leadership – Argentina & Brazil
Led a cross-border team of 9 recruiters, overseeing full-cycle hiring across tech and business functions. Drove alignment with business units through structured stakeholder engagement, performance dashboards, and pipeline health reviews, enabling faster, data-informed decision-making.

🔧 Process Reengineering & Candidate Experience
Managed the redesign of recruitment processes at NEORIS Brazil, reducing time-to-hire and improving candidate satisfaction scores. Introduced operational improvements that enhanced recruiter productivity and aligned sourcing strategies with regional tech talent availability.

📈 Strategic Hiring Enablement
Partnered with delivery and project management teams to ensure hiring plans aligned with business demand and delivery capacity. Optimized recruiter performance through analytics, continuous feedback loops, and structured intake processes with hiring managers.
skills: Dirección y desarrollo de equipos de trabajo

experience.description: Led full-cycle recruitment for SAP talent across Mexico, USA, and Canada for niche markets including Financial Services, Utilities, and Retail. Supported clients through targeted sourcing, international headhunting, and role matching for specialized SAP profiles.

Managed high-volume, end-to-end recruitment for diverse operational and administrative roles across Argentina. Conducted sourcing, interviewing, reference checks, and client alignment using ATS (AXTON KTNA / CVI) and LinkedIn Recruiter.

- Achieved up to 90% monthly coverage in sourcing and placements.
- Temporarily led the recruitment team during supervisor absences.
- Hired for roles across logistics, retail, HR, and sales functions.
Travelling around UK, Portugal & Italy.

- Recruitment and Selection. Job Posting. References check. Cold Calls. Interviews (In-person, Virtual and Skills and Competency Interviews). Assessment Centre. English Evaluations. Interviews Reports. Daily Contact with Costumers.
- Internal Personnel Management: onboarding processes (Employee Handbook and Brochure); health insurance; compensation insurance company; Management of Personnel files; staff rotation rate; work environment analysis.
- Commercial area: developing potential costumers; detecting recruiting and selection needs. Drawing up estimates.

-Profiles: Financial Analyst; Administratives; Accountants; Internal Auditors; Taxes Specialists; Mechanical Engineer; Industrial Engineer; Interns; Pharmacist; Receptionist; Logistics)

Recruiting SAP profiles Worldwide.
Job Postings.
E-mail contact with Candidates. 
Transcripting Resumes into the Company's Format.

SAP Profiles: FI, CO, ABAP, MM, WM, OIL&GAS, HR

receivedRecommendations.givenByHeadline: Salesperson and Client Manager at Bibiai
receivedRecommendations.givenAt: June 6, 2025, César worked with Alejandra but on different teams
receivedRecommendations.description:
Ale es una de esas personas que marca la diferencia en una organización.
He tenido el placer de compartir los últimos dos años en Inversiva junto con ella y apreciar de primera mano el cambio que ha liderado en la compañía, tanto en la cultura como en la creación del departamento de People.
Su estilo mantiene un equilibrio entre la visión de negocio y las necesidades de las personas en la empresa, consiguiendo una sinergia perfecta para el avance estratégico de la compañía. 
Además, trabajar en un proyecto junto con Ale ha sido siempre sinónimo de éxito, organización y buenos resultados y se trata de una compañera leal, que está siempre dispuesta a echar una mano siempre que la necesites.
En lo personal Ale genera buen ambiente en donde está, contagia su carisma y está siempre lista para dar su mejor versión.

receivedRecommendations.givenByHeadline: People Experience Analyst en Kidscorp
receivedRecommendations.givenAt: September 1, 2023, Marisol reported directly to Alejandra
receivedRecommendations.description: Ale es una profesional excelente. Tuve la suerte de tenerla como líder y siempre trabajamos en conjunto para lograr los objetivos del área. Durante el tiempo compartido aprendí muchísimo de ella y siempre me dio la libertad para indagar y colaborar con nuevas tareas. Agradezco su transparencia, flexibilidad y buena comunicación para conmigo siempre.

receivedRecommendations.givenByHeadline: People Director @Kidscorp #GOBIG👊🏼
receivedRecommendations.givenAt: August 23, 2023, Sabrina managed Alejandra directly
receivedRecommendations.description: Ale es una persona con un potencial enorme. Tiene la perfecta combinación entre ideas innovadoras y la energía e inteligencia para llevarlas a cabo. Tuve la oportunidad de trabajar con ella dos veces y si algo admiro de ella es su capacidad de aprendizaje y de adaptabilidad, que haga que sea un placer trabajar con ella. La recomiendo sin dudarlo.

receivedRecommendations.givenByHeadline: Especialista en Evaluaciones
receivedRecommendations.givenAt: May 22, 2018, Laura worked with Alejandra on the same team
receivedRecommendations.description: Alejandra es una profesional expeditiva, enérgica, participativa. Cuenta con dominio en herramientas informáticas e idioma ingles, lo cual genera un plus en cada una de sus gestiones de selección en RRHH. Se destaca por el  excelente nivel comunicacional.

receivedRecommendations.givenByHeadline: Senior IT Recruiter, Talent Acquisition at SBI Technology | LinkedIn Top Recruiter worldwide
receivedRecommendations.givenAt: February 4, 2014, Melina managed Alejandra directly
receivedRecommendations.description:
En su paso por Hublance, Alejandra ha demostrado ser una persona proactiva, inteligente, responsable y muy comprometida con su trabajo. Tiene un alto potencial de aprendizaje, y ha sabido ponerse a la altura de las exigencias de nuestros clientes en cuestión de semanas.
Ha logrado cubrir con éxito las demandas que le hemos asignado, manejándose siempre de manera eficaz y eficiente.
Es además una persona flexible, que sabe adaptarse a diferentes condiciones de trabajo, especialmente en cuanto a tiempos y espacios, mostrando siempre buena predisposición y aportando alegría al equipo de trabajo.

He tenido el placer de compartir los últimos dos años en Inversiva junto con ella y apreciar de primera mano el cambio que ha liderado en la compañía, tanto en la cultura como en la creación del departamento de People.
Su estilo mantiene un equilibrio entre la visión de negocio y las necesidades de las personas en la empresa, consiguiendo una sinergia perfecta para el avance estratégico de la compañía. 
Además, trabajar en un proyecto junto con Ale ha sido siempre sinónimo de éxito, organización y buenos resultados y se trata de una compañera leal, que está siempre dispuesta a echar una mano siempre que la necesites.
En lo personal Ale genera buen ambiente en donde está, contagia su carisma y está siempre lista para dar su mejor versión.

receivedRecommendations.givenByHeadline: People Experience Analyst en Kidscorp
receivedRecommendations.givenAt: September 1, 2023, Marisol reported directly to Alejandra
receivedRecommendations.description: Ale es una profesional excelente. Tuve la suerte de tenerla como líder y siempre trabajamos en conjunto para lograr los objetivos del área. Durante el tiempo compartido aprendí muchísimo de ella y siempre me dio la libertad para indagar y colaborar con nuevas tareas. Agradezco su transparencia, flexibilidad y buena comunicación para conmigo siempre.

receivedRecommendations.givenByHeadline: People Director @Kidscorp #GOBIG👊🏼
receivedRecommendations.givenAt: August 23, 2023, Sabrina managed Alejandra directly
receivedRecommendations.description: Ale es una persona con un potencial enorme. Tiene la perfecta combinación entre ideas innovadoras y la energía e inteligencia para llevarlas a cabo. Tuve la oportunidad de trabajar con ella dos veces y si algo admiro de ella es su capacidad de aprendizaje y de adaptabilidad, que haga que sea un placer trabajar con ella. La recomiendo sin dudarlo.

receivedRecommendations.givenByHeadline: Especialista en Evaluaciones
receivedRecommendations.givenAt: May 22, 2018, Laura worked with Alejandra on the same team
receivedRecommendations.description: Alejandra es una profesional expeditiva, enérgica, participativa. Cuenta con dominio en herramientas informáticas e idioma ingles, lo cual genera un plus en cada una de sus gestiones de selección en RRHH. Se destaca por el  excelente nivel comunicacional.

receivedRecommendations.givenByHeadline: Senior IT Recruiter, Talent Acquisition at SBI Technology | LinkedIn Top Recruiter worldwide
receivedRecommendations.givenAt: February 4, 2014, Melina managed Alejandra directly
receivedRecommendations.description:
En su paso por Hublance, Alejandra ha demostrado ser una persona proactiva, inteligente, responsable y muy comprometida con su trabajo. Tiene un alto potencial de aprendizaje, y ha sabido ponerse a la altura de las exigencias de nuestros clientes en cuestión de semanas.
Ha logrado cubrir con éxito las demandas que le hemos asignado, manejándose siempre de manera eficaz y eficiente.
Es además una persona flexible, que sabe adaptarse a diferentes condiciones de trabajo, especialmente en cuanto a tiempos y espacios, mostrando siempre buena predisposición y aportando alegría al equipo de trabajo.
